metadata.title: CVE-2015-0233 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Multiple insecure Temporary File vulnerabilities in 389 AdministrationServer before 1.1.38.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0233` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

389-admin - 1.1.42-1
libds-admin-serv0 - 1.1.42-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: 389-admin package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.1.42-1').
